text: Arras Football Association is a French association football team founded in 1901. It is based in Arras, France and plays in the Régional 1, the sixth tier in the French football league system. It plays at the Degouve-Brabant Stadium in Arras. From 1901–1997, the club was called RC Arras. In 2013, the club made the ninth round of the Coupe de France and lost against Paris Saint-Germain 4–3. http://www.goal.com/en-us/match/arras-v-psg/rqcdhqm00soxfo35aaln1lh ==References== ==External links== * Category:Football clubs in France Category:Association football clubs established in 1901 Category:1901 establishments in France Category:Arras
title: Arras FA
